com.epam.ja.kmw.dao

Interface BookStoreDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BookStoreDaoImpl

    public interface BookStoreDao
    Author:
    filipm It stores functions needed to operate on bookstores.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addBookStore(BookStore bookStore)
      Adds to database a bookstore and returns true.
      boolean delBookStore(int bookStoreId)
      Deletes a bookstore stored in a database and which ID is sent as an argument and returns true.
      List<BookStore> getAllBooksStores()
      Returned container is a list of Bookstore class objects stored in a database.
      BookStore getBookStoreById(int bookStoreId)
      Returned object is stored in a database and is an instance of a Bookstore class.
      boolean updateBookStore(BookStore bookStore)
      Updates a bookstore in a database and returns true.

    • Method Detail

      • addBookStore

        boolean addBookStore(BookStore bookStore)
        Adds to database a bookstore and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        bookStore - object that will be added
        Returns:
        true if operation succeed, false if not.

      • updateBookStore

        boolean updateBookStore(BookStore bookStore)
        Updates a bookstore in a database and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        bookStore - object that will be updated.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeeds, false if not.

      • delBookStore

        boolean delBookStore(int bookStoreId)
        Deletes a bookstore stored in a database and which ID is sent as an argument and returns true. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns false.
        Parameters:
        bookStoreId - ID of a bookstore that will be deleted.
        Returns:
        true if operation succeed, false if not.

      • getAllBooksStores

        List<BookStore> getAllBooksStores()
        Returned container is a list of Bookstore class objects stored in a database. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns null.
        Returns:
        a list of all bookstores contained in a database.

      • getBookStoreById

        BookStore getBookStoreById(int bookStoreId)
        Returned object is stored in a database and is an instance of a Bookstore class. It is selected by its ID. If connection fails method catches SQLException and returns null.
        Parameters:
        bookStoreId - ID of a bookstore that will be returned.
        Returns:
        a specific bookstore by its ID.
